name: Sean Foreman
description: '''Sean Foreman''' (born August 27, 1985) is an American singer, songwriter and rapper from [[Boulder, Colorado]]. He is a member of the electronic pop duo [[3OH!3]] with [[Nathaniel Motte]]. He has also written and produced for artists such as [[Ariana Grande]], [[Fitz and the Tantrums]], [[The Summer Set]], [[Karmin]] and [[Steve Aoki]], among many more.
